Articles.Content:
I was going through some old stuff of mine when I came across my rocket stomper. Does anyone else remember these? I used to put baby powder in the rocket to look like smoke when it lifted off, and I tried filling the pump with vinegar and the rocket with baking soda once.. (didn't work well).

If you don't know what it is, it is an air powered rocket launcher, with a pump that you have to jump on to launch the rocket (the harder you hit the pump, the further it launches the rocket).
